title: BigQuery
description: A server that enables secure and efficient communication between Claude Desktop and BigQuery, allowing users to query data in plain English without writing SQL.
creator: ergut

PROJECT_ID.description: Your Google Cloud project ID for BigQuery.

BIGQUERY_LOCATION.description: The BigQuery location, with a default value of 'us-central1'.

KEY_FILE.description: The path to a service account key JSON file for authentication in production environments.
